A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SPOILERS: So there was approximately 20-30 minutes of irrelevant plot and it was the entire Fin and Rose quest for a codebreaker. Their efforts were for nothing because in the end the admiral (name is escaping me) destroyed the imperial fleet. Also Luke's character direction was disappointing and not something I could see him from Episodes 4-6 doing. Keeping it short\, it feels like more of a commerical movie than one with a serious plot; it is intended to sell tickets and merchandise because of the Star Wars name.
